title: "CT Segmentation of Dinosaur Fossils by Deep Learning"
excerpt: "Recently, deep learning has reached significant advancements in various image-related tasks, particularly in medical sciences. Deep neural networks have been used to facilitate diagnosing medical images generated from various observation techniques including CT (computed tomography) scans."
